name: Flower Defender (Rewind Fields)
description:
This is my first game, prompted through my tertiary studies. 

I made all the art, music and programming for this game. 

Controls 

'WASD' Move

'Shift' Boost

'B' recruit Bee Workers 

'Space' Shoot and select.

The Bee, controlled by the player, must recruit fellow Worker Bees to keep supplying the hive with pollen to maintain the survivability of the Hive. The player is responsible for propagating more flowers, maintaining the symbiotic relationship of plant and insect, which is crucial for the Hive and other life in this world to be continued. The player must be busy and fulfill his duties with haste, while fending off and avoiding danger of the dreaded Wasps.
